Hello everyone,

I am about to head over to the University of Sussex (in Br=
ighton,
England) to do their MSc in Evolutionary & Adaptive Systems.

Howev=
er, as I am Canadian, the concept of doing a PhD there is a
little daunting=
 because of the cost. Unfortunately, I am not aware of
many other Universit=
ies that would be interested in funding a PhD of
such research focuses (let=
 alone would be able to comprehensively
support students along the way). Th=
is assumes, of course, that my MSc
is wildly successful and I come up with =
a research question worthy of
funding.

Anyhow, I was hoping that some of t=
he members here might be able to
point out other Universities (in North Ame=
rica or English-speaking
Europe) that may be appropriate to do such a PhD i=
n. These are the
ones I'm familiar with now:

University of Edinburgh
Unive=
rsity of Sussex
University of Central Florida

I realize this isn't directl=
y related to NEAT but I couldn't think of
a more knowledgeable group on the=
 subject matter a hand. If there is a
more appropriate group, then please j=
ust point me in the right
direction and I'll not post about this again here=
. Apologies if it's
too off-topic.

Cheers,
Mike
